_qaQmi3GPP2BroadcastCfgInfo Struct Reference

This structure contains the 3GPP2 Broadcast Configuration Information parameters. More...

#include <qaGobiApiSms.h>

Data Fields

BYTE activated_ind

struct CDMABroadcastConfig CDMABroadcastConfig [CONFIG_LEN]

Detailed Description

Parameters:
activated_ind 
  • Broadcast SMS
    • 0x00 - Deactivated
    • 0x01 - Activated
num_instances 
  • Number of sets (N) of parameters Following each set describes one entry in the broadcast configuration table.
    • serviceCategory
    • language
    • selected
broadcastConfig 
  • A CDMABroadcastConfig structure array.
  • Further defined by the structure CDMABroadcastConfig
